text: Clyde Duane Wardlow (July 2, 1932 – August 7, 2017) is a former American football player who played for Los Angeles Rams of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at the University of Washington. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:American football defensive ends Category:Washington Huskies football players Category:Los Angeles Rams players
title: Duane Wardlow
